attributes.action: Allow Bill Bailey represent Great Britain at The Eurovision song contest in 2010.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We believe Bill Bailey would be Britain's best candidate to represent and win for Britain at the Eurovision Song contest.

Bill Bailey is highly recognised as a great comiedian, song writer and performer. His name is known throughout the Europe and most of the world for his combination of music and comedy.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
